headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  VAN BUREN, ROBERT

snippet: VAN BUREN--Robert. April 23, 1925. Happy Birthday, Dad. I miss you every single day, it will always be that way. Love, "Bronc" 1/3
lead_paragraph: VAN BUREN--Robert. April 23, 1925. Happy Birthday, Dad. I miss you every single day, it will always be that way. Love, "Bronc" 1/3
